1.9.4.1.1.2: The current MC 1.10.2 release now works with MC 1.9.4.

1.10.1.1.2: The current MC 1.10.2 release now works with MC 1.10.

1.10.2.1.0.1:
File name now includes Minecraft version.
Updated mcmod.info.
1.10.2.1.1.1: Backport of the current MC 1.11.2 release to MC 1.10.2.
1.10.2.1.1.2: Added the Crying Obsidian Blocks to the Ore Dictionary.

1.11.1.0.2:
Updated to Minecraft 1.11.
Fix Version Checker not working properly.
1.11.1.1.0:
Added a decoration variant of the Crying Obsidian Block. It is just for decoration and does nothing, but it is cheaper to craft.
Added an advanced variant of the Crying Obsidian Block. It can only be used by its owner (this can be disabled in the config) and an entity can be bound to it. An entity that is bound to an advanced Crying Obsidian Block will respawn at the block's position when it dies.
You can now set your spawn point while under water. The spawn point will be set above the water.
Added a config option to set your spawn point at the block's position instead of the player's position when right-clicking on a Crying Obsidian Block.
The recipe for crafting a Crying Obsidian Block/Item is now shapeless.
1.11.1.1.1:
Added a tooltip to the Crying Obsidian Item.
Some internal improvements.
1.11.1.1.2:
The Crying Obsidian Block now works in all dimensions (only works if your Minecraft Forge version is 13.20.0.2249 or higher).
Added the Crying Obsidian Block to the Ore Dictionary.

1.11.2.1.0.2:
Updated to Minecraft 1.11.
Fix Version Checker not working properly.
This version also works with MC 1.11.2.
1.11.2.1.1.0:
Added a decoration variant of the Crying Obsidian Block. It is just for decoration and does nothing, but it is cheaper to craft.
Added an advanced variant of the Crying Obsidian Block. It can only be used by its owner (this can be disabled in the config) and an entity can be bound to it. An entity that is bound to an advanced Crying Obsidian Block will respawn at the block's position when it dies.
You can now set your spawn point while under water. The spawn point will be set above the water.
Added a config option to set your spawn point at the block's position instead of the player's position when right-clicking on a Crying Obsidian Block.
The recipe for crafting a Crying Obsidian Block/Item is now shapeless.
1.11.2.1.1.1:
Added a tooltip to the Crying Obsidian Item.
Some internal improvements.
1.11.2.1.1.2:
The Crying Obsidian Block now works in all dimensions (only works if your Minecraft Forge version is 13.20.0.2249 or higher).
Added the Crying Obsidian Block to the Ore Dictionary.

1.12.1.1.3:
Note: Minecraft Forge 14.21.1.2387 or higher is required.
Updated to Minecraft 1.12.
Added a new config option: Enable Advanced Crying Obsidian entity re-spawning. If it is disabled, you can no longer bind entities to an Advanced Crying Obsidian Block.
Added a Config GUI: you can now change the config options in-game.
Improved the Advanced Crying Obsidian Block tooltip.
Removed the config option that disabled the Advanced Crying Obsidian Block recipe.
Fixed an issue where the Advanced Crying Obsidian Block would respawn entities even after the block was broken. This could be fixed before my restarting Minecraft.
Some internal improvements.
1.12.1.2.0:
Note: Minecraft Forge 14.21.1.2387 or higher is required.
Added a new config option: Enable re-spawn whitelist. If this option is enabled, only entites in the re-spawn whitelist can be bound to the advanced Crying Obsidian block. The re-spawn whitelist uses entity IDs that can be obtained using the /summon command.
Added a new config option: Disable sleeping in beds. If this option is enabled, players can no longer sleep in beds.
Updated translations.
Some internal improvements.

Some internal improvements.
